AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.metaDescription: Learn more about me, my background, and what I do.
AboutPage.heading: About Me
AboutPage.intro: Software Engineer passionate about architecture, automation, and developer experience.
AboutPage.backgroundText: My focus is on the backend with Java and Spring Boot, but I'm equally comfortable on the frontend with React, Angular, and TypeScript. I appreciate containerization and spend a lot of time with cloud infrastructure on AWS: spinning up EKS clusters with Terraform and rolling out applications via Helm. On the automation side, I like using Renovate to keep dependencies up to date.
AboutPage.whatIDoText: As a Senior IT Consultant at msg for banking, I build web applications for the banking sector, automate cloud infrastructure, and optimize development workflows. I share what I learn here on my blog.
AboutPage.connectText: Feel free to reach out on <github>GitHub</github> or <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>.
